\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://learn.epam.com/detailsPage?id=26a40ebb-abeb-453e-bdbb-148d9819ea02&source=PROGRAM\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Support Groups\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\". Here, in a very safe space, you can meet colleagues who may be dealing with similar situations to share your experiences, stories, emotions and draw strength from each other. All group meetings are moderated by an EPAM coach who facilitates discussions, topics, and the overall process. This format is not the classic therapy, but a resource group field to get emotional support at any level of engagement. Please note that forming groups can take time therefore it could be necessary to wait. The waiting period should not exceed 3 months (maximum
